name: Coin Trader Simulator
description:
Everybody wants to get rich! Start with a 100$ christmas gift from your grandmother and a pathetic office at the basement of your parents’ house, invest in bitcoin, ethereum, tether or dogecoin. Be a better trader by leveling up.Sense trends or create your own ones. Buy the dip, sell the rip and rise to the top!

Sense Trends


Get experience by each successful selling, and increase trend sensing abilities to predict which way the coin will move.

Pump & Dump


Having Diamond Hands could be painful right? Why are you waiting for the rip to sell and earn some money? Use the Cheeper, the social media platform in Coin Trader Simulator, to pump your coin to the moon!

Houses


It’s shameful to trade millions and still live with your parents, right? Buy better houses and become the crypto king.
